thread.section_title: Travel: late deals & bargains, holiday news and advice - Mirror Online
thread.title: Late holiday deals: Last minute bargain long and short haul, city breaks, staycations and cruises
thread.title_full: Late holiday deals: Last minute bargain long and short haul, city breaks, staycations and cruises - Mirror Online

author: Nigel Thompson
title: Late holiday deals: Last minute bargain long and short haul, city breaks, staycations and cruises
text:
LONG HAUL
Bangkok – book by Aug 25 for return flights with Etihad Airways from Manchester, Edinburgh and Heathrow from £451. Valid for travel until Jun 30. 0345 608 1225.
India - 7nts B&B at the 4* Doubletree by Hilton in Ximer Arpora Bardez, Goa, from £681pp. Inc flights from Heathrow on Sept 1. Sept and seven nights’ accommodation on a bed and breakfast basis.
Florida - 7nts r/o at the 3* Celebration Suites at Old Town in Kissimmee from £445pp based on a family of 4 sharing and travelling with Delta Air Lines from Heathrow on Oct 26. 020 8290 9797.
SHORT HAUL
Turkey – 7nts s/c at the 3*+ Suncity Apartments in Side for £279pp based on 3 sharing inc transfers. Fly from Leeds Bradford on Aug 31.
CITY BREAKS
Rome - 2nts B&B at the 4* ESH Hotel from £115pp (saves 44%) inc flights from a choice of London airports plus Birmingham, East Midlands, Bristol, Manchester and Leeds Bradford. For travel on selected dates in Nov/Dec. 020 3474 0453.
Barcelona – fly from Manchester on Nov 2 for 2nts r/o at the 4* Ilunion Almirante hotel from £149pp. 0800 083 6000.
FERRY
Brittany – 2nt break (1nt in a 2-berth en suite cabin on ferry/1nt B&B in Hotel Kyriad near Dinard) inc Portsmouth-St Malo return crossing with car between Sept 1-Oct 31. From £99pp based on 2 sharing. 0330 159 4700
CRUISE
Newcastle sailing - Boudicca’s 11nt Myths & Legends of Ireland & the UK round trip itinerary departs on Oct 6 and calls at Portsmouth, Falmouth, Cobh, Dublin, Belfast, Kirkwall, Invergordon and Edinburgh. From £799pp .
STAYCATION
Cornwall - 40% off all s/c short breaks and 7nt stays for 4 people at 5* Gwel an Mor Resort, near Portreath, between Aug 28-Sept 4. From £687 for 3nt w/end or 4nt m/wk short break (saves £458); £1,023 for 7nts (saves £682). Inc free £50 voucher to spend onsite at spa or restaurant. 01209 842 354.
DailyMirror
